content.question: To give his work, such as Old Man's Cloth, the appearance of a flowing tapestry, El Anatsui uses

choices.label: pounded bark fiber that has been woven into a sheet and painted
flattened labels from liquor bottle-caps fastened together with copper wire
handmade paper scrolls covered with invented characters and symbols
saffron-colored fabric that is draped from a metal gateway

content.answer: flattened labels from liquor bottle-caps fastened together with copper wire

topic.text: 10.1: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Global Contemporary Art

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, technique, and/or content shape a work of art (or group of related works of art).
